short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open all links on the page in new tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You know how you open all the links on the page in separate tabs and then close them one at a time? This extension will do the grunt work for you by opening each link on a single reddit page in separate tabs.

All you have to do is click the alien in the address bar.

That's it. Go feed your 'ctrl/cmd + w' habit.
